name: Journey to the Savage Planet
summary: It’s a lighthearted first-person adventure in which players have been sent off to an uncharted planet that they must explore and determine if it is habitable. It’s launching in 2019 on PlayStation 4, Windows PC and Xbox One.
info:
• 中文名: 野蛮星球之旅
  • 开发: Typhoon Studios
  • 发行: 505 Games
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 游戏类型: AVG
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 2020年1月28日
